hero.title: Create Talking, Singing Character Videos
hero.description: Easily transform any text or audio into lifelike character animations using our cutting-edge AI technology, giving your content unique vitality.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Discover how Hedra AI revolutionizes your video creation workflow.
features.card1Desc: Input your ideas, and AI will help you build engaging storylines and scripts.
features.card2Desc: Select or upload voice samples, and AI will generate natural speech with specific emotions and styles.
features.card3Desc: Create unique AI characters from text descriptions or images, supporting various styles and customization options.
features.card4Desc: Supports import and export of various mainstream audio and video formats, seamlessly integrating with your workflow.
features.card5Desc: Share your creations to major social media platforms with one click, or generate links for easy sharing.
features.card6Desc: Directly convert your text scripts into complete videos with voice and character animation.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Unleash your creativity in just a few simple steps.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Provide your text script, audio file, or a simple description of your idea.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose character style, voice type, and AI will automatically process and generate an initial preview.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Adjust details, and once satisfied, generate the high-definition video.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Download your work or share it directly with your audience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your common questions here.
faq.q1: What languages does Hedra AI support?
faq.a1: Hedra AI currently primarily supports English and Chinese for text input and voice generation, with more languages under continuous development.
faq.q2: Can the generated videos be used for commercial purposes?
faq.a2: Yes, depending on your chosen subscription plan, generated videos can be used for personal and commercial purposes. Please consult our terms of service for details.
faq.q3: Do I need professional video editing knowledge to use it?
faq.a3: Not at all! Hedra AI is designed to enable users without any professional background to easily create high-quality AI videos.
faq.q4: How long does video generation take?
faq.a4: Generation time depends on the length and complexity of the video. Typically, a few-minute video can be completed in a few to ten minutes.
faq.q5: Can I upload my own character models?
faq.a5: We currently offer a rich preset character library and AI character generation features. Future versions plan to support user-uploaded custom models.
faq.a6: We support major credit card payments and some third-party payment platforms. Please refer to the subscription page for details.
faq.q7: Is there a free trial version?
faq.a7: Yes, we offer a free trial version where you can experience core features and generate short videos with watermarks.
faq.q8: How can I get help if I encounter problems?
faq.a8: You can find documentation in our help center or contact our customer service team directly. We are here to assist you.
